#Text= Tarrlok says : " As I told Chief Saikhan , Korra came to my office late last night .

column1: #Text=She was upset that I arrested her friends .
#Text=She asked me to release them and ... that 's when the Equalists attacked .
#Text=I tried to protect Korra , but we were outnumbered .
#Text=When I came to , the police had arrived .
#Text=Chief Saikhan , mobilize the entire police force .
